title: Tobacco Settlement
description: Senate Judiciary Committee members heard testimony concerning the settlement of the lawsuit against tobacco companies. Attorneys General for the tobacco industry Meyer Koplov, tobacco company representatives and anti-tobacco representatives provided their perspectives on the settlement and whether Congress needs to change it. They also discussed the global implications of the settlement.
